description: This simple chicken korma is better than takeaway, rich and creamy with deliciously tender chicken.
name: Slow Cooker Chicken Korma Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat half of the oil in a deep pan on medium heat and cook the chicken for 5 minutes to brown. Remove with a slotted spoon and set aside.

Heat the rest of oil and cook the onions for 6-7 minutes. Add the ginger and garlic and cook for 2 minutes. Tip in the spices and cook for 1 minute. Add the tomato puree and tip the chicken back into the pan. Stir to coat, pour over the stock and simmer for 2 minutes. Pour into the slow cooker.
Cook on high with the lid on for 3 hours. Add the cream, ground almonds and honey and cook with the lid off for 10 minutes, until reduced.
